title: Understanding Entropy Change in Phase Transitions
text: When a gas turns into a liquid, what happens to its orderliness and energy distribution?

title: Nature of Condensation
text: Condensation involves a gas transforming into a liquid. Does this process generally increase or decrease molecular disorder?

title: Entropy and Order
text: Entropy is often associated with the level of disorder in a system. A decrease typically indicates an increase in order.

title: Entropy Change in Condensation
text: What is the sign of the entropy change when water vapor condenses to form liquid water?
